# Packages

I will use `tidyverse` for data handling and plotting.

```{r}
library(infer)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load data

```{r}
tephritis_data <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/irmoodie/teaching_datasets/refs/heads/main/tephritis_phenotype/tephritis_phenotype.csv")
```

```{r}
tephritis_data

clean_data <- #<1>
  tephritis_data |> 
  filter(wing_length_mm < 10) |>
  filter(body_length_mm < 10) #<2>
```

# Plot data

```{r}
clean_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = body_length_mm, y = sex)) +
  geom_violin()

clean_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = wing_length_mm, y = wing_width_mm, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point()

clean_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = region, fill = host_plant)) +
  geom_bar()
```
